headline: Etched by an Attack, An Activist Emerges
abstract: The movie is based on the life of Laxmi Agarwal, who was burned with acid in New Delhi 2005.
lead_paragraph: The Indian drama “Chhapaak” succeeds in balancing extremes. It is at once a pleasing and buoyant inspirational story, and a realistic depiction of the brutal aftermath of acid attacks.
